mapper.select: SELECT item.id, item.item_order_no, item.user_id, item.product_json, item.product_total_quantity, item.product_total_amount, item.actual_pay_amount, item.order_status, item.logistics_company, item.logistics_no FROM t_order_item item INNER JOIN t_order_main main ON item.main_order_id = main.id WHERE main.id = #{id} AND main.del_flag = 0 AND item.del_flag = 0;
